name: Nasi Lemak
description: Fragrant rice cooked in coconut milk, served with sambal, anchovies, peanuts and egg.

comment.text: Love the flavors in this dish.

name: Char Kway Teow
description: Stir-fried flat rice noodles with prawns and cockles.

comment.text: Best char kway teow in town!

name: Hainanese Chicken Rice
description: Poached chicken with fragrant rice, chili sauce and ginger.

name: Laksa
description: Spicy coconut-based noodle soup with fish or prawns.

comment.text: Perfect balance of sour and spicy.

name: Roti Canai
description: Flaky flatbread served with dhal or curry.

comment.text: Crispy at the edges, soft inside.

name: Satay
description: Skewered grilled meat served with peanut sauce.

name: Rendang
description: Slow-cooked dry beef curry with rich spices.

name: Mee Goreng
description: Stir-fried yellow noodles with vegetables and egg.

name: Curry Laksa
description: Curry-based noodle soup with tofu puffs and seafood.

name: Nasi Kandar
description: Rice with various curries and side dishes.

comment.text: So many choices, great for sharing.

name: Nasi Goreng
description: Fried rice with egg and vegetables.

name: Kuih Lapis
description: Layered steamed cake made with rice flour and coconut milk.

name: Teh Tarik
description: Pulled tea with condensed milk, frothy and sweet.

name: Bak Kut Teh
description: Herbal pork rib soup simmered with Chinese herbs.

name: Cendol

name: Apam Balik

name: Nasi Ulam
description: Herb rice salad mixed with shredded herbs and toasted coconut.

name: Pisang Goreng

name: Otak-Otak

name: Assam Pedas
